subject: p16848073
Findings: As compared to the previous radiograph, there is no relevant change. Status post gastrectomy, postoperative widening of the right upper mediastinum with creation of a double contour. Unchanged small right pleural effusion with subsequent areas of atelectasis. No recent or acute changes, no edema, no pneumonia. Constant size of the cardiac silhouette.
